title: 检测掉落物问题
author: MC........
txt_content: 怎么检测在某个x,y,z（或者x,y,z到x2,y2,z2的区域）之内含有Lore:123，并且物品名是233的骨粉

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: testfor @e[x,y,z,dx=x2-x,dy=y2-y,dz=z2-z,type=Item] {Item:{id:"dye",Damage:15s,tag:{display:{Name:"233",Lore:["123"]}}}}手打的 希望没错 把有颜色的改成数

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2015-9-19 12:36
testfor @e[x,y,z,dx=x2-x,dy=y2-y,dz=z2-z,type=Item] {Item:{id:"dye",Damage:15s,tag:{display:{Name:"2 ...
那如果单独检测x,y,z到x2,y2,z2的区域的指令呢？这条指令也能检测吗？
